Talk_16:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Ease_01>Ahhh...<sp:5:0:0> Giving the wings a stretch after
a lot of work is the best.

I'm glad I came to this Lurelin place for
a break after all that effort with the
Skyview Towers.
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:Wakeup_01>Just take it all in. The smell of the sea...
That fresh scent off the waves...<sp:5:0:0> We just
don't have that where we're from.
Talk_61:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:TalkPositive_01>I've heard it called a briny bouquet...<sp:5:0:0>
The scent of the fruits of the sea...

Crabs, fish, blueshell crabs...<sp:5:0:0> Hmm, fresh
seafood all around.
Talk_17:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_00>So true, so true.<sp:5:0:0> I find it so...<sp:5:0:0>wonderful.


<sp:3:0:2:0801>Billson,<sp:5:1:0> I get the sense that you and I...<sp:5:0:0>
we might have a lot in common.
Talk_62:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Ease>The briny bouquet... The fruits of the
sea...<sp:5:0:0> How delicious.
Talk_23:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Greeting_00>It's not every day I meet another Rito
who'd really take to a place like this.

The smell of the waves really unruffles
my feathers.<sp:5:0:0> So relaxing.
Talk_24:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Ease>The smell of the waves...<sp:5:0:0> How totally
relaxing.
